amendment.description: Amendment prohibits TARP fund recipients from outsourcing new customer service or call center jobs to foreign companies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-3 to prohibit TARP fund recipients from outsourcing new customer service or call center jobs to foreign companies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Myrick amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. Myrick.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Myrick amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
